name: Ronald CLARK, Appellant, v. John McANANY, Mary Reese, Louis S. Folino, Sharon M. Burks, Kristen P. Reisinger, Jeffery A. Beard, Craig Haywood, John Doe ("C.S.I."), Lieutenant Tanner, Brenda Martin, and Robert Narchus, Appellees

parties: Ronald CLARK, Appellant, v. John McANANY, Mary Reese, Louis S. Folino, Sharon M. Burks, Kristen P. Reisinger, Jeffery A. Beard, Craig Haywood, John Doe (“C.S.I.”), Lieutenant Tanner, Brenda Martin, and Robert Narchus, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 19th day of March, 2008, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
943 A.2d 261
Ronald CLARK, Appellant, v. John McANANY, Mary Reese, Louis S. Folino, Sharon M. Burks, Kristen P. Reisinger, Jeffery A. Beard, Craig Haywood, John Doe (“C.S.I.”), Lieutenant Tanner, Brenda Martin, and Robert Narchus, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
March 19, 2008.
